usage.cn: 生活中一半麻烦是由于你说yes 太快，说no太慢！
usage.eng: Half of the troubles in life is caused by your instant response "Yes"and a delay "No".

usage.cn: 总有那么有一个人，他的一条短信就可以让你立刻微笑。
usage.eng: There is always that one person who can send you a text and cause you to smile instantly.

usage.cn: 世界千万人的失败，都是失败在做事不彻底，往往做到离成功尚差一步就终止不做了
usage.eng: Millions of failures are caused by people who do things not thoroughly. It happens that some people cease or give up when it is just one step before success.
